basic.description: This half-credit course will be offered to students who have completed ANAT-417* in their undergraduate studies in the Queen's Life Sciences Program.  Through a series of tutorials and seminars, the course will focus on the most up-to-date discoveries in three areas of developmental biology.  The areas reflect the expertise in the department.  Winter Term. Dr C.W. Reifel.
basic.subject: ANAT
basic.title: Advanced Topics In Embryonic D
